name: VoiceFriend
0:
”Alexa, open voice friend.”
”Alexa, ask voice friend for my messages.”
”Alexa, ask voice friend for my meals.”

des: VoiceFriend is a HIPAA compliant, cloud-based communication automation and management platform designed for organizations that care for seniors.
